options.name: fileName
options.description: The name of the file

options.name: keepRevisionForever
options.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Google Drive. Only 200 revisions for the file can be kept forever. If the limit is reached, try deleting pinned revisions.

options.name: trashed
options.description: Whether to move a file to the trash. Only the owner may trash a file.

options.name: ocrLanguage
options.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code)

options.name: parentId
options.description: The ID of the parent to set

options.name: useContentAsIndexableText
options.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text

properties.description: By default the response only contain the ID of the file. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

properties.name: options
properties.description: A plain text custom message to include in the notification email

options.name: emailMessage
options.description: A plain text custom message to include in the notification email

options.name: enforceSingleParent
options.description: Whether to opt in to API behavior that aims for all items to have exactly one parent. This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive.

options.name: fields
options.description: All fields
All fields

options.name: moveToNewOwnersRoot
options.description:
This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive and the request is attempting to transfer the ownership of the item.

When set to true, the item is moved to the new owner's My Drive root folder and all prior parents removed.

options.name: sendNotificationEmail
options.description: Whether to send a notification email when sharing to users or groups

options.name: supportsAllDrives
options.description: Whether the requesting application supports both My Drives and shared drives

options.name: transferOwnership
options.description: Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer

options.name: useDomainAdminAccess
options.description: Whether to perform the operation as domain administrator, i.e. if you are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs, you will be granted access automatically.

options.name: name
options.description: The name the file should be saved as

options.name: parents
options.description: The IDs of the parent folders the file/folder should be saved in

options.name: spaces
options.description: All spaces

options.name: [All]
options.description: All spaces

options.name: corpora
options.description: All files in "My Drive" and "Shared with me"

options.name: User
options.description: All files in "My Drive" and "Shared with me"

options.name: Domain
options.description: All files shared to the user's domain that are searchable

options.name: Drive
options.description: All files contained in a single shared drive

options.name: allDrives
options.description: All drives

options.name: driveId
options.description: ID of the shared drive to search. The driveId parameter must be specified if and only if corpora is set to drive.

properties.hint: The Google Drive drive to operate on

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of this shared drive

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the current user can add children to folders in this shared drive

options.name: capabilities
options.description: Whether the current user can add children to folders in this shared drive

options.name: canAddChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can add children to folders in this shared drive

options.displayName: Can Change Copy Requires Writer Permission Restriction
options.name: canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermissionRestriction
options.description: Whether the current user can change the copyRequiresWriterPermission restriction of this shared drive

options.displayName: Can Change Domain Users Only Restriction
options.name: canChangeDomainUsersOnlyRestriction
options.description: Whether the current user can change the domainUsersOnly restriction of this shared drive

options.name: canChangeDriveBackground
options.description: Whether the current user can change the background of this shared drive

options.displayName: Can Change Drive Members Only Restriction
options.name: canChangeDriveMembersOnlyRestriction
options.description: Whether the current user can change the driveMembersOnly restriction of this shared drive

options.name: canComment
options.description: Whether the current user can comment on files in this shared drive

options.name: canCopy
options.description: Whether the current user can copy files in this shared drive

options.name: canDeleteChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can delete children from folders in this shared drive

options.name: canDeleteDrive
options.description: Whether the current user can delete this shared drive. Attempting to delete the shared drive may still fail if there are untrashed items inside the shared drive.

options.name: canDownload
options.description: Whether the current user can download files in this shared drive

options.name: canEdit
options.description: Whether the current user can edit files in this shared drive

options.name: canListChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can list the children of folders in this shared drive

options.name: canManageMembers
options.description: Whether the current user can add members to this shared drive or remove them or change their role

options.name: canReadRevisions
options.description: Whether the current user can read the revisions resource of files in this shared drive

options.name: canRename
options.description: Whether the current user can rename files or folders in this shared drive

options.name: canRenameDrive
options.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive

options.name: canShare
options.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive

options.name: canTrashChildren
options.description: Whether the current user can trash children from folders in this shared drive

options.name: colorRgb
options.description: The color of this shared drive as an RGB hex string

options.name: createdTime
options.description: The time at which the shared drive was created (RFC 3339 date-time)

options.name: hidden
options.description: Whether the shared drive is hidden from default view

options.name: restrictions
options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

options.name: adminManagedRestrictions
options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

options.name: copyRequiresWriterPermission
options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

options.name: domainUsersOnly
options.description: Whether access to this shared drive and items inside this shared drive is restricted to users of the domain to which this shared drive belongs. This restriction may be overridden by other sharing policies controlled outside of this shared drive.

options.name: driveMembersOnly
options.description: Whether access to items inside this shared drive is restricted to its members

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to issue the request as a domain administrator; if set to true, then the requester will be granted access if they are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs. (Default: false).

options.name: useDomainAdminAccess
options.description: Whether to issue the request as a domain administrator; if set to true, then the requester will be granted access if they are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs. (Default: false).

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Query string for searching shared drives. See the "Search for shared drives" guide for supported syntax.

options.name: q
options.description: Query string for searching shared drives. See the "Search for shared drives" guide for supported syntax.

options.name: useDomainAdminAccess
options.description: Whether to issue the request as a domain administrator; if set to true, then the requester will be granted access if they are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs. (Default: false).

options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

options.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

hints.text: The name of the output binary field to put the file in
The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded
The Google Drive drive to operate on

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
